options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Apache Guacamole Server (guacd).

options.name: extraEnvironment
options.desc: Environment variables to pass to guacd.

options.name: host
options.desc: The host name or IP address the server should listen to.

options.name: logbackXml
options.desc: Configuration file that correspond to logback.xml.

options.name: port
options.desc: The port the guacd server should listen to.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: userMappingXml
options.desc: Configuration file that correspond to user-mapping.xml.
